featured.text: Around 1800, the seventh Duchess of Bedford, Anne Maria, began the popular practice of “afternoon tea,” a ceremony taking place at about four o’clock.

definition.zh_def: 貝德福德，一個位於英國的城市，通常指貝德福德郡的首府。
definition.en_def: Bedford, a town in England, often referred to as the county town of Bedfordshire.
definition.example: I visited Bedford last summer and enjoyed its beautiful parks.
